titles.title: Making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-64, by Mr. Ryan.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 41.
